name: Ceridian HCM Holding Inc.
description: Ceridian HCM Holding Inc. is a global human capital management (HCM) software company that provides solutions to help businesses manage their workforce. Founded in 1992 and headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota, Ceridian is best known for its flagship product, Dayforce, which offers a comprehensive suite of HR services including payroll, talent management, workforce management, and employee engagement tools. Ceridian's innovative cloud-based platform allows organizations to streamline their HR processes, improve operational efficiency, and enhance the employee experience. The company focuses on leveraging technology to provide actionable insights through data analytics, helping businesses make informed decisions about their workforce. As a pioneer in the HCM space, Ceridian is committed to transforming the way organizations manage their human resources and is recognized for its customer-centric approach and continuous innovation. With a global presence, Ceridian serves a diverse range of industries, empowering organizations of all sizes to attract, develop, and retain talent effectively.
